citations.narrative:
There were 4 kennels containing 13 dogs total that had puppy doors between the indoor and outdoor runs that were in
need of repair. The truscore panels bordering the puppy doors on the inside of the kennels were broken resulting in
jagged edges that could injure the dogs. The broken areas also resulted in exposed wooden beams that were not
impervious to moisture.
Failure to maintain primary enclosures in good repair with no sharp edges can result in injury to the dogs. Exposed wood
that is not impervious to moisture cannot be properly cleaned and sanitized and may result in disease hazards that affect
the dogs.
Primary enclosures must be constructed and maintained so that they have no sharp points or edges that could injure the
dogs.
Correct by: May 6, 2026
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative..
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(i) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
There were 4 kennels containing 13 dogs total that had puppy doors between the indoor and outdoor runs that were in 
need of repair. The truscore panels bordering the puppy doors on the inside of the kennels were broken resulting in 
jagged edges that could injure the dogs. The broken areas also resulted in exposed wooden beams that were not 
impervious to moisture. 
Failure to maintain primary enclosures in good repair with no sharp edges can result in injury to the dogs. Exposed wood 
that is not impervious to moisture cannot be properly cleaned and sanitized and may result in disease hazards that affect 
the dogs. 
Primary enclosures must be constructed and maintained so that they have no sharp points or edges that could injure the 
dogs. 
Correct by: May 6, 2026 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative..
